title: Constraints on media in auth. China, dem. Mexico

content.question:
The media serves an important function in all political systems. 
(a) Identify one governmental constraint on media freedom in China in the past decade AND explain how it helps sustain the authoritarian regime in China. 
(b) Explain why China has allowed some media freedom in the past decade. 
(c) Explain how the media helps sustain democracy in Mexico. 
(d) Describe one nongovernmental constraint on media freedom in Mexico in the past decade. 
(e) Explain why democratic regimes place constraints on media.
